issue.title: [R] Implement S3 file-system interface in R
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6439](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6439). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6439?focusedCommentId=16931992) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
aws-sdk-cpp isn't going to be available on Windows (cf. https://github.com/r-windows/rtools-packages/pull/37), so we'll need to make sure that this feature is flagged based on whether the C++ library has been built with `ARROW_S3` on.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6439?focusedCommentId=16944737) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This is ready to start now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6439?focusedCommentId=17085306) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6901
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6901>
